department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Engineering, Procurement, or Installation Services for ECCC Eureka, DND Eureka and NRCan PCSP Facilities Ellesmere Island and Resolute Bay, Nunavut
description: Provided services can include but are not limited to Infrastructure maintenance and repair services; engineering consulting services to provide site-specific design and layout for the various facilities. All the information on infrastructure such as layout, design, specifications and criteria shall be encapsulated in a book documenting these details in a correctly formatted manner. Documentation should not exceed 4 pages. In addition to the above, any other services required to complete the project such as environmental impact assessments, The evaluation and management of construction measurement variations, As-built Constructed Plan Documentation, and updating records of previously constructed projects ,_
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Overview
Notice ID: WS4218251193, also known as RFP - FBI - ECCC Eureka, DND Eureka and NRCan PCSP Facilities, is a Request for Proposal (RFP) published by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC), the Department of National Defence (DND), and the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

#### Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4218251193
* **Amendment Number**: 17
* **Publication Date**: September 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 20, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: November 14, 2036
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and more
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of the Environment (ECCC), Department of National Defence (DND), and Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### Notice URL
Notice URL is available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17478209?extsite=MTc0NzgyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17478209?extsite=MTc0NzgyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Attachment
No attachments are available for this notice.

#### Description
Amendment to Closing Time: All bids must be submitted by March 20, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. ECCC Eureka, DND Eureka, and NRCan PCSP Facilities Ellesmere Island and Resolute Bay, Nunavut. Note that bids received after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

Note that all contact information has been removed as it seems to be identical for both English and French versions, and included information is redundant. Any additional information will be added as it becomes necessary. Comment below where you need
